fg::VertexProxyList

Detailed Description

A VertexProxyList maintains a list of vertexProxies and is responsible for updating the internal pointers when the vertices change location or notifying proxies if vertices are deleted..

XXX: Need to accommodate VCG's Allocator PointerUpdater design. i.e., be compatible with a std::vector<VertexPointer*>...

void fg::VertexProxyList::add ( boost::shared_ptr< VertexProxy >  v  ) 

Add a new vertexproxy to this list. It will be removed when their are no more references to the vertexproxy (besides this one). *

Referenced by fg::Mesh::selectAllVertices(), and fg::Mesh::selectRandomVertex().

std::vector< VertexImpl ** > fg::VertexProxyList::getUpdateList (  ) 

Return a list of pointers to pointers to vcg::vertex, this will be used in the vcg Allocator to update the internal refs of VertexProxies
